summary: During archery in a wood Princess Fantaghiro is discovered by the hostile king's son Romualdo. He is able to take a short look at her before she can escape and immediately falls in love ... See full summary »
cast: Alessandra Martines|Mario Adorf|Kim Rossi Stuart|Ángela Molina|Jean-Pierre Cassel|Luciano Manzalini|Eraldo Turra|Stefano Davanzati|Tomás Valík|Ornella Marcucci|Katerina Brozová|Lenka Kubálková|Philip Licman|Stanislava Bartosová|Jan Morávek|Pavel Chalupa|Jan Zedvick|Jan Kraus|Martin Faltýn|Filip Renc|Katerina Frýbová|Simona Chytrová|Jirí Patocka|Olga Schmidtová|Markéta Hrubesová|Antonie Hegerlíková|Emanuela Hernández|Liza Hudrackova
title: Fantaghirò
